A ray of light coming from the point P (1, 2) gets reflected from the point Q on the x-axis and then passes through the point R (4, 3). If the point S (h, k) is such that PQRS is a parallelogram, then hk
2 is equal to : (1) 80 (2) 90 (3) 60 (4) 70

2 is equal to : (1) 80 (2) 90 (3) 60 (4) 70
